content: टंकः, --कं [टंक्-घञ् अच् वा] {@--1@} A hatchet, an axe; a stone-cutter's chisel; टंकैर्मनः शिलगुहेव विदार्यमाणा <ls>Mk. 1. 20</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 80.</ls> {@--2@} A sword. {@--3@} The sheath of a sword. {@--4@} A peak shaped like the edge of a hatchet; the slope or declivity of a hill; <ls>Bk. 1. 8.</ls> {@--5@} Anger. {@--6@} Pride. {@--7@} The leg. {@--8@} A chasm, cleft. {@--9@} The wood-apple tree. {@--10@} Borax. {@--11@} A weight of silver equal to four Māṣas. {@--12@} The fruit of the wood-apple ({%<ab>n.</ab>%}). {@--13@} A stamped coin. {@--14@} A spade, hoe. --का The leg.
